articles.title: Crudup Out, Verdu In "The Flash" Film - Dark Horizons
articles.description: “Y Tu Mama Tambien” and “Pan’s Labyrinth” actress Maribel Verdu has joined the cast of Andy Muschietti’s “The Flash” movie at Warner Bros. Pictures. Verdu will play the key role of Nora Allen, Barry Allen’s mother who plays an important role in the upcoming f…
articles.content:
“Y Tu Mama Tambien” and “Pan’s Labyrinth” actress Maribel Verdu has joined the cast of Andy Muschietti’s “The Flash” movie at Warner Bros. Pictures.
